overview: A young girl falls in love with a synthesizer - Benoît Sabatier, rock-critic and Marcia Romano, screenwriter for François Ozon, Emmanuelle Bercot and Xavier Gianolli build in full independence a small universe through which the contemporary music scene crosses. A synth-pop hymn, fetishistic and sensual - on an original score by Blackmail.
title: Amore Synthétique
